FuncDef: This command dumps MCS database information.
CLIs: sync-database [ peer <ip-address> ] [ port <port-id> | <lag-id> ] [ sync-tag <sync-tag> ] [ application <application> ] [ detail ] [ type <type> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the peer s IP address.
Indicates the port or LAG ID to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer. Values-slot/mda/port or lag-lag-id.
Specifies a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer.
Specifies a particular multi-chassis peer synchronization protocol application.
Indicates the locally deleted or alarmed deleted entries in the MCS database per multi-chassis peer. Values-alarm-deleted, local-deleted.
